title: Aji Amarillo-Pineapple Salsa
directions: Combine all ingredients in medium bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Let stand 2 hours, tossing occasionally. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
ingredients: 3 cups 1/4-inch cubes peeled cored pineapple (about half of 1 large)
2 tablespoons chopped seeded red jalapeño chiles
4 teaspoons hot pepper Aji Amarillo paste* (from 7.5-ounce jar)
